channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Singles Day : iPhone 17, iPad Pro M5, AirPods Pro 3… les prix des nouveaux produits Apple sont déjà en chute libre sur Rakuten
item.description: Le Singles Day 2025 s’invite sur Rakuten avec d’importantes réductions sur les produits Apple. iPhone, iPad, Mac et AirPods affichent des prix en forte baisse. Une opportunité à saisir avant le Black Friday pour profiter du meilleur de l’écosystème Apple à tarif réduit.

item.title: The PS5 has now sold 84.2 million units since launch as Sony reports an increase in revenue for its games division
item.description: As the PS5 celebrates its fifth anniversary, Sony has reported that the console has now sold 84.2 million units.

item.title: The iPhone Air 2 Might Already Be DOA
item.description: Well, that was fast.

item.title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X : la mise à jour qui pourrait tout sauver est enfin là
item.description: Asus pousse un nouveau driver AMD et un firmware MCU via Armory Crate. C'est peut-être LE patch qu'on attendait tous depuis le lancement raté.

item.title: Best Hiking Boots (2025): Walking Shoes, Trails, Backpacking
item.description: From strenuous hikes and serious summits to weekend rambles in the park, these boots help you make the most of your time outdoors.

item.title: Snapchat is letting subscribers revive their 2D Bitmojis
item.description: Snapchat is bringing its 2D Bitmoji user avatars back for paying subscribers. Over the coming days, users with a Snapchat Plus subscription (which starts at $2.25 per month for the annual plan) can enable a new “Comic Bitmoji” option that renders 3D avatars in a cartoon-style 2D. “Think of it like a filter for your […]

item.title: iPhone Pocket : Apple et Issey Miyake lancent une chaussette/bandoulière pour iPhone à un prix délirant
item.description: Chez Apple, la bandoulière pour iPhone est vraiment l'accessoire à la mode du moment. Après avoir lancé une gamme de lanières au prix fort en même temps que les iPhone 18, le constructeur en a remis une couche aujourd'hui avec l'iPhone Pocket.

item.title: Meta Quest 3 : la version 512 Go de ce très bon casque VR coûte près de 300 € de moins qu’à son lancement grâce au Singles Day
item.description: Casque combinant réalité virtuelle et réalité mixte, le Meta Quest 3 est un sérieux concurrent de l'Apple Vision Pro. Mais la solution de Meta est bien moins onéreuse que sa rivale, et c'est encore plus le cas actuellement : le Meta Quest 3 de 512 Go est en ce moment proposé à 419 euros seulement.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Book Lovers (2025): From E-Readers to Boxed Sets
item.description: These gift ideas will make your favorite bookworm very happy, from e-readers to cozy accessories.

item.title: The next iPhone Air has reportedly been delayed
item.description: Apple is no longer planning to launch a second-generation iPhone Air next fall and has “already sharply scaled back production of the first version,” The Information reports. The next Air is instead likely to launch in spring 2027 at the earliest, and will be upgraded with a second camera lens, according to a follow-up Information […]

item.title: ChatGPT 5.1 could launch soon - 5 features we’d love to see from OpenAI’s next generation chatbot
item.description: ChatGPT-5.1 could be a refined evolution of GPT‑5, with hopefully better memory, creativity, accuracy, automation, and personality that sticks.

item.title: The new RoboUP Raccoon 2 SE promises to be the best-value robot mower for small lawns: Just press play
item.description: As much simplicity as possible, and for an affordable price.

item.title: Le Black Friday chinois démarre fort : voici les meilleures offres en DIRECT du 11 novembre à l’occasion du Singles Day
item.description: Le 11 novembre, c'est le 11.11, ou Singles Day. Voyez le un peu comme le Black Friday chinois où il est possible de faire d'excellentes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech populaires. Dans cet article, nous vous partageons les meilleures offres sélectionnées par la rédaction.

item.title: Le flop de l’iPhone Air fera-t-il capoter le lancement de son successeur ?
item.description: Encore des mauvaises nouvelles pour l'iPhone Air. Apple aurait décidé de reporter le lancement de la deuxième génération de son smartphone ultra-fin, qui était plus ou moins attendue pour l'automne 2026.

item.title: I spent a week with the DJI Osmo Mobile 8, and it's just as good as pricier Hohem and Insta360 rivals
item.description: The affordable, well-equipped, and well-designed Osmo Mobile 8 improves on some of the OM 7P's weaknesses.

item.title: Nvidia hasn't canceled RTX 5000 Super refreshes as previously rumored – but don't expect these GPUs anytime soon
item.description: RTX 5000 Super GPUs aren't canned, but may not arrive until later in 2026 – with doubts raised over the RTX 6000 timeframe, too.

item.title: Samsung brings a generative AI-powered Bixby to its TVs
item.description: Samsung is rolling out new conversational AI across its 2025 TVs that lets users ask questions about what’s on the screen and beyond it. First announced in September, the generative AI update is rolling out now with support for several languages. Vision AI Companion is based on an upgraded, generative AI-based version of Samsung’s virtual […]

item.title: EU set to crack down on Huawei, ZTE hardware in member countries
item.description: Europe is still trying to remove Huawei and ZTE equipment from 5G and other telecoms networks.

item.title: Tractive Smart Pet Collar: An Inexpensive Way to Keep Tabs on Your Fur Baby
item.description: This GPS collar tracks your cat while monitoring their sleep and activity, providing an early warning of potential problems.

item.title: Black Ops 7 release time for your timezone – here's when BO7 launches for PC and consoles
item.description: Here's the Black Ops 7 release time, and how to preload. Everything you need to know about playing Black Ops 7 as early as possible.

item.title: Leaked images suggest DJI is close to launching its first 360 degree drone – and it could land before Insta360’s Antigravity
item.description: DJI is tipped to launch its first true 360 degree drone, the 8K-shooting Avata 360, and it could be available this year.

item.title: Despite being announced over seven years ago, The Elder Scrolls 6 is 'still a long way off' according to Todd Howard
item.description: Todd Howard has provided an update on the development of the long-awaited Elder Scrolls 6, which he says is still no closer to launch.

item.title: Verizon launches huge Black Friday sale: free iPhone 17, Samsung Galaxy S25, Pixel 10, and more
item.description: Looking for a new phone or home internet plan? Verizon's Black Friday sale is live and it features some of the carrier's best deals this year.

item.title: Bring your brand to life this Black Friday- get 88% off premium logo packages at Design.com
item.description: Just type your brand name to explore thousands of stunning logo ideas.

item.title: Whoops! Verizon just leaked a secret Pixel update – here are the upgrades you can expect very soon
item.description: Your Google Pixel phone might soon get an update to make it more secure, fix some annoying bugs, and improve the battery and charging.

item.title: What Would it Take to Convince a Neuroscientist That an AI is Conscious?
item.description: Before we can test for AI consciousness, we need to understand how consciousness actually emerges, experts say.

item.title: The ‘Pirate Lady’ of ‘Pluribus’ on What It’s Like Playing the Whole World in One Character
item.description: Karolina Wydra talks about her character in Apple TV's new sci-fi standout: the elegant, infuriatingly accommodating Zosia.

item.title: People Are Ditching Their Used Teslas… and Finding Eager Buyers
item.description: Are people mellowing Elon or is there just a lot of inventory to go around?

item.title: Booze Without the Burn? An Enzyme-Tinkering Startup Aims to Make Spirits Smoother
item.description: Voodoo Scientific has developed a process that, when applied to fiery hooch, results in a more sippable tipple.

item.title: Exclusive: The most important browser designer of the past 25 years explains how he topped himself again
item.description: Darin Fisher, who’s worked on everything from Firefox and Chrome to Arc, gives Fast Company the inside story of OpenAI’s Atlas browser’s tabs, side chat, and agent features, plus what’s next. Darin Fisher is a little older than the fresh-faced, newly minted PhD types you see roaming the well-appointed floors at OpenAI’s second location in San Francisco’s Mission Bay district. ...

item.title: 5 questions with Ikea’s new CEO, who explains why he’s happy with revenue being flat
item.description: Juvencio Maeztu, in his first interview since becoming Ikea’s CEO, shares why he’s committed to ‘everyday low prices,’ is doubling down on caring for the planet, and how he wants you to socialize inside his stores. Ikea’s new CEO Juvencio Maeztu is calling to tell me about the Ingka Group’s latest earnings (that’s the parent company behind Ikea). As it turns out, there are worse fates than a company making a little less money than it did last year....

item.title: Glen Powell reacting to unpopular opinions from radio callers is a fun watch
item.description: Glen Powell appeared on BBC Radio 1 and played "Unpopular Opinion" with host Greg James.

item.title: Google explains the Gemini Home rollout 'confusion' – and reveals when to expect a full launch
item.description: Google has given us more information about what's happening with Gemini for Home, and when you might get it.

item.title: Apple annonce l’iPhone Pocket : ce n’est pas ce que vous imaginez
item.description: Apple et ISSEY MIYAKE lancent l'iPhone Pocket : une pochette tricotée à partir de 150 dollars pour porter votre iPhone en bandoulière. Non, ce n'est pas une blague. Oui, ça existe vraiment.

item.title: I tracked down 20+ early Lego deals already live ahead of Black Friday: Star Wars, Minecraft, and more
item.description: I found 20+ Lego sets that are already on sale ahead of Black Friday, including the Lego Star Wars Wicket the Ewok set, the Lego Minecraft The Crafting Table, and more.

item.title: The answer to sneaker recycling? Getting rival brands to collaborate
item.description: A group of sustainability experts from brands like Brooks and New Balance are collaborating to build the shoe recycling technology of the future. Every year, the $463 billion global footwear industry make 20 billion pairs of shoes for just 8 billion humans. Since virtually none of them are recyclable, they will end up clogging up landfills around the world....

item.title: Histoire du… HTC Hero : quand HTC Sense réinventait Android
item.description: Ce téléphone avec son menton ridicule et sa trackball rouge était le premier smartphone Android vraiment désirable.
